thread.title: Citi to Offer Added $4.5 Million in Refunds for Overcharged Fees
thread.title_full: Citi to Offer Added $4.5 Million in Refunds for Overcharged Fees

title: Citi to Offer Added $4.5 Million in Refunds for Overcharged Fees
text:
Citi to Offer Added $4.5 Million in Refunds for Overcharged Fees Bank previously reached deal to return $16 million to customers By lisa.beilfuss@wsj.com Aug. 19, 2015 10:13 a.m. ET 
Citigroup Inc. will offer additional reimbursements totaling about $4.5 million to some customers who were overcharged fees on their investment accounts, New York Attorney General Eric Schneiderman said Wednesday. 
The refunds follow an agreement the bank reached in October with the New York Attorney General to return $16 million in principal and interest to 31,000 customers after it was discovered those with certain types of... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Popular on WSJ
